articles.author: Samantha Murphy Kelly, CNN Business
articles.title: Apple to pay $113 million over deliberately slowing down iPhones - CNN
articles.description: Apple has agreed to pay millions of dollars to 34 states over its controversial previous practice of deliberately slowing down older iPhones to extend their battery life.
